about_the_game:
Chupa Chupa VR is a classic stealth licking game that has you licking recorders, drinks, and other things in a familiar classroom, all while trying not to get caught by the girls.

◆Punishment (Or Perhaps a Reward)

If a girl catches you licking things, the game will end, and a very tough punishment will await you.

◆A Safe and Reliable Time Skip Cell Phone

Even if you end up in the worst (or best) outcome after getting caught by a girl, you can start over from the beginning as many times as you like with the attached cell phone, so you can enjoy yourself until you are satisfied.
Also, rest assured that your high scores and licking experiences will be carried over between each game.

◆Ranking Feature

There is also a competitive ranking feature that tracks how many things you licked, and how quickly and accurately you licked them without getting caught by a girl, so you can compete with lickers across the world.

◆Dream Items

In addition to things that lickers consider must-lick items such as recorders, drinks, bathing suits, and toothbrushes, there are also dream items like a watch that stops time and medicine that makes you invisible.

◆Nurse's Office

The nurse's office allows you to change the language and volume settings, and if you purchase the wardrobe DLC, you can also enjoy the girls in many different outfits.

◆Character change

If you purchase the following DLC, you will be able to change your character. (Game content will not change.)

highlighted.name: The recorder flute of the beginning
The taste of a stack of bills

content_descriptors.notes:
Mild sexual content.
All characters in this game are 18 years of age or older.

name: Chupa Chupa VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: Chupa Chupa VR is a classic stealth licking game that has you licking recorders, drinks, and other things in a familiar classroom, all while trying not to get caught by the girls.
supported_languages:
English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
